# Pull Request

## Summary

Briefly explain what this pull request does.  
Example: "Added new company â€“ Acme Corp."

---

## Type of Change

- [ ] New company / job entry  
- [ ] Update to existing company  
- [ ] Documentation or metadata change  

---

## Checklist

Please make sure you've done these before submitting:

1. Added or updated the company in `data.json`.  
2. Added the logo file (if any) to the correct folder.  
3. Checked that `data.json` is valid and formatted properly.  
4. Double-checked your links and spelling.  

---

## Example (for reference)

```json
{
  "name": "Acme Corp",
  "slug": "acme-corp",
  "url": "https://acme.com/careers",
  "locations": ["Remote"],
  "logo": "acme-corp.webp"
}
```
